short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality of Life updates, Fixed Controls Positioning. Added a color picker option, reset option and an improved icon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a ruler that can be used to line up specific items on your screen. 
Has a timer that allows you to change the distance moved as well as the time between moves
NEW!! 
- Remembers the entered values across browser sessions
- Added a color picker option
- New Icon
